sentences.sentence: In 1939 he married Clare Hollway, a divorcee 13 years his senior.
sentences.translation: 1939年他娶了克莱尔·霍尔韦，一个比他大13岁的离婚女人。

sentences.sentence: Ten years of marriage more than justifies 40 years as a divorcee.
sentences.translation: 而10年的婚姻完全能够让40年的离婚生活也变得值得起来。

sentences.sentence: It came as no surprise to me that Sandra segued from Oscar winner to divorcee to mother in the blink of an eye.
sentences.translation: 因此来说，对桑德拉的多重角色我不感到意外，在我眼里她是奥斯卡获得者、婚姻离异者、孩子的妈妈。
